pages.title: Sky Stone
pages.text: $(item)Sky Stone$() is a blast resistant dark stone block found in $(l:appliedenergistics2:world_gen/sky_stone#meteorite)meteorites$(/l) that have impacted the surface in the distant or semi recent past. Their origin is unknown, however they appear to contain remnant of technology from another place.

$(item)Sky Stone$() is extremely hard and requires at least a diamond pick to mine it, however the $(l:appliedenergistics2:decorative_blocks/sky_stone_blocks)processed variants$(/l) can be removed with any pick.$(br2)Can be ground into $(item)Sky Stone Dust$() (which has no current uses).

pages.title: Meteorites
pages.text: $(thing)Meteorites$() spawn during world generation on the surface or underground, and vary in size. They generally contain a $(l:appliedenergistics2:simple_tools/sky_stone_chests)Sky Stone Chest$(/l) which can contain various ingredients required for advanced technology. You can use a $(l:appliedenergistics2:simple_tools/meteorite_compass)Meteorite Compass$(/l) to locate $(thing)meteorites$() near you and as you explore.
